flawed_nl_solution:
The pumpkin patch sold 96 / 3 = <<96/3=23>>23 pumpkins.
They have 83 - 23 = <<83-23=60>>60 pumpkins left.
Thus, the pumpkin patch will produce 60 / 3 = <<60/3=20>>20 cans of pie filling.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
